short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will analyze a page using site GTmetrix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This will check the speed of your internet using GTmetrix Plugin.
This extension will give a report on your website speed on the new tab. 
This will give a good idea of why its slow or why it is fast.
